Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $11000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
